metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12678 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
In TagLib 1.11.1, the rebuildAggregateFrames function inid3v2framefactory.cpp has a pointer to cast vulnerability, which allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have unspecifiedother impact via a crafted audio file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12678` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtag1v5 - 1.11.1+dfsg.1-0.2build2
libtag1v5-vanilla - 1.11.1+dfsg.1-0.2build2
libtagc0 - 1.11.1+dfsg.1-0.2build2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: taglib package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.11.1+dfsg.1-0.2build2').
